name: GlowyJump
description:
General Info

Glowyjump is a 2D platformer game.

Level Unlocks

There are 50 levels.You have to reach hole to go next level.

You Have to Reach Hole.

Physics

Every platform has his own mechanics. Some are rotating, faster.
There are some gravity areas when you go inside this areas you can feel zero gravity.
Watch out meteors !

More levels and sound effects coming with first update !! Coming soon
